trans-unit.source: Uses Windows authentication to authenticate the user name and password in a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken" /> security token.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows 驗證來驗證 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken" /> 安全性權杖中的使用者名稱和密碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A> method uses Windows authentication to authenticate a user name and password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A> 方法會使用 Windows 驗證來驗證使用者名稱和密碼。

trans-unit.source: To provide a custom authentication scheme, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供自訂驗證配置，請參閱 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> class
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When the user is authenticated, claims that identify the Windows groups that a user belongs to are initially added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A> property and eventually to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者進行驗證時，負責識別使用者所屬 Windows 群組的宣告一開始會加入至 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A> 屬性，最後才加入至 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to get the groups the Windows user belongs to; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得 Windows 使用者所屬的群組，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> class by specifying whether the claims that identify the Windows groups that a user belongs to are initially added to the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets" /> property when the user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 指定當使用者進行驗證時，負責識別使用者所屬 Windows 群組的宣告是否一開始就加入至 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> 屬性，初始化 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The user name associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 與安全性權杖相關聯的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The password associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 與安全性權杖相關聯的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the specified user name and password and returns the set of authorization policies for <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken" /> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 驗證指定的使用者名稱和密碼，並傳回 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken" /> 安全性權杖的授權原則集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy" /> that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.
trans-unit.target: 型別為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy" />，其中包含對這個應用程式有效用的授權原則集合。

trans-unit.source: The `userName` parameter must be in one of the following formats: `domain\username` or `username`.
trans-unit.target: `userName` 參數必須使用下列其中一種格式：`domain\username` 或 `username`。

trans-unit.source: If the `userName` parameter is in the `domain\username` format, then there must be only one backslash (\\) character separating the user name and domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果`userName`參數是在`domain\username`格式，則必須只有一個反斜線 (\\) 字元分隔使用者名稱和網域。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="userName" /> contains more than one backslash (\\) character.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="userName" /> 含有一個以上的反斜線 (\\) 字元。
